channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Server] - Migration of vss
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 21, 20:00 UTC  -  Apr 22, 02:00 UTC

Apr 1, 01:57 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/04/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 22/04/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Loss of management IPs only switchs for about 3 mins
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the infrastructure

item.title: [ERI1][NETWORK] - ERI0111A01B
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 12, 02:00 - 04:00 UTC

Mar 29, 23:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/04/2022 02:00 UTC
End time : 12/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network outage during maintenance for servers without LACP (Link Aggregation Control Protocol) configured
Service improvement : We need to resolve interface issue or any other bug and to apply new software version

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - R832B16
item.description:

Mar 30, 18:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/04/2022 02:00 UTC
End time : 11/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Interruption of the public network during maintenance for some servers will be present.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to reload some servers and apply an update on them.

item.title: [RBX][vRack] - Rack - A25A05
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 5, 01:00 - 02:00 UTC

Mar 29, 20:43 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/04/2022 01:00 UTC
End time : 05/04/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Loss of network for 15 minutes
Service improvement : The objective of this operation is to upgrade due to a bug and the switch reboots when memory is low.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
item.description:
Apr 3, 22:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

item.title: [RBX2][vRack] - Switch unavailable
item.description:
Apr 3, 19:29 UTC
Resolved - We close the incident, the instabilities have been corrected

Apr 3, 17:45 UTC
Monitoring - Update : The update has been successfully completed. No impact at this time.

We are keeping the ticket on monitoring to confirm that the update fixes the instabilities.

Apr 3, 17:20 UTC
Update - Update : Our team will update the switch firmware to resolve the instabilities. This update will take between 10 and 15 minutes.

Apr 3, 17:19 UTC
Identified - Start Time : 03/04/2022 17:04 UTC
End Time : 03/04/2022 17:06 UTC
Root cause : Switch encountered instability.

The vRack Switch was unavailable for a few minutes. This impacted the following racks:
34A01 / 34A02 / 34A03 / 34A04 / 34A05 / 34A06 / 34A07 / 34A08 / 34A09 / 34A10 / 34A13 / 34A14 / 34A16 / 34B24 / 34B26 / 34B28.

item.title: [GRA1][Public network] - G115A09
item.description:
Apr 3, 08:20 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/04/2022 05:33 UTC
End Time : 03/04/2022 08:09 UTC
Service impact : All servers are now operational. Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause : A water leak caused this issue.
Service status :Resolved.

Apr 3, 06:32 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/04/2022 05:33 UTC
Service impact : 5 servers out of 48 are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on.

item.title: [GRA1][Public Network] - G115A10
item.description:
Apr 3, 06:18 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/04/2022 05:35UTC
End Time : 03/04/2022 06:08UTC
Service impact : All the servers are now operational. Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause :Tor public was anavailable because a leak on an electrical PDU . The water leak is now fixed.
Service status :Resolved

Apr 3, 06:04 UTC
Update - Update : 2 out of 30 servers are still unreachable

Apr 3, 05:58 UTC
Update - Update :Tor has been fixed and is now operational.

Apr 3, 05:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/04/2022 05:35UTC
Service impact : The rack is unreachable, the Tor (switch) is unavailable
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on.

item.title: [RBX2][vRack] - Switch unavailable
item.description:
Apr 3, 03:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/04/2022 15:03 UTC

The vRack Switch was unavailable for a few minutes. This impacted the following racks:

item.description:
Apr 2, 05:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/04/2022 05:46 UTC

Root cause : Switch rebooted after a kernel panic.

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - 53A24
item.description:
Mar 31, 16:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 31/03/2022 15:20 UTC
End Time : 31/03/2022 16:34 UTC
Service impact : Public network on this rack was unreachable
Root cause : A network equipment was unreachable which caused the incident.

Mar 31, 16:00 UTC
Identified - Root cause : A network equipment is unreachable which caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently replacing the network equipment.

Mar 31, 15:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/03/2022 15:20 UTC
Service impact : Public network on this rack is unreachable
